hotel_name_: Savoy Hotel Manila - Multiple Use Hotel
location: Andrews Avenue Newport City, Pasay, 1309 Manila, Philippines
description: Savoy Hotel Manila features of an outdoor swimming pool, located 200 m from Resorts World Manila, this 4-star property offers  24-hour front desk and an on-site restaurant and bar. Every room at Savoy Hotel Manila is air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, and a desk. A private bathroom with walk in shower and free toiletries is also include in each room. Other units are equipped with a mini-bar, a tea/coffee maker, and have an access to the Executive Lounge. A daily breakfast is available at the property while room service is also available. Savoy Cafe also serves International cuisine, ala carte. At the hotel, facilities such as a gym and a steam and sauna room are available for guests. On-site parking is available. City of Dreams Manila is 1.7 mi, while Glorietta Mall is 2.2 mi away. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 1.2 mi from the hotel.

description: Overlooking the Manila Bay, TRYP by Wyndham Mall of Asia Manila is 0.6 mi from SM Mall of Asia.  It features an outdoor swimming pool, a restaurant and free shuttle to the city. Free WiFi is available in all areas and free private parking is available at the property. Decorated in neutral and muted colors, the rooms are air-conditioned. A cable TV and a tea/coffee maker are featured. Some rooms have a seating area and a kitchenette. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. International and Spanish cuisines are served at the à la carte restaurant, Milagritos. Guests can also enjoy drinks and snacks at  the bar. You can exercise at the fitness center or chill by the swimming pool. Staff at the 24-hour reception can assist you with airport shuttle services at an extra charge. Valet parking is provided for free. SM By the Bay Amusement Park is 0.6 mi from TRYP by Wyndham Mall of Asia Manila, while SMX Convention Center is 0.8 mi away. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 3.1 mi from the property.

location: 1660 Jorge Bocobo Street, Malate, 1004 Manila, Philippines
description: The Manila Manor Hotel is located in Manila within 2.3 mi from Intramuros and 3.7 mi from SM Mall of Asia, featuring an on site restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, and massage services available all day. Free WiFi is also available throughout the property. All rooms come with air conditioning, a cable TV, and a mini-bar. A safety deposit box and a private bathroom with hot/cold shower facility and toiletries are also included in each room, while some rooms come with a living area with sofa and a dining area with kitchenette. Every morning at the property, guests may enjoy Asian or Continental breakfast while room service is also available for guests who wish to dine in the comfort of their rooms. Cafe Luz also serves local Filipino favorites. The hotel features a business center and the property is equipped with CCTV cameras for a 24-hour security. For guests wanting to relax, massage services are also available at any time of the day. Newport Mall is 5.7 mi from Manila Manor Hotel and the nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 7.1 mi away from the property.

description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Belmont Hotel Manila - Multiple Use Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Located at the heart of Resorts World Manila, Belmont Hotel Manila is a 5-minute walk from Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) Terminal 3 via Runway Manila. description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Infinity Tower Suites! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Boasting of an indoor swimming pool, a fitness center, an an on-site spa, Infinity Tower Suites is a 4-star property located in Manila within the city of Makati,  751 m from SM Jazz Mall and 0.6 mi from Century City Mall. location: Newport Boulevard, Newport City, , Pasay, 1301 Manila, Philippines
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Belmont Hotel Manila - Multiple Use Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Located at the heart of Resorts World Manila, Belmont Hotel Manila is a 5-minute walk from Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) Terminal 3 via Runway Manila. All rooms are well-appointed and are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a safety deposit box. The air-conditioned rooms also have an private bathroom that offers bathrobes, hair dryer, slippers and toiletries. The rooms also offer views of the airport, garden and/or city. Complimentary WiFi is accessible in all rooms. The in-house restaurant Café Belmont serves local and international cuisine. Other facilities in the property include a rooftop outdoor pool, hot tub, steam and sauna room as well as a fitness center. Belmont Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Makati CBD and Bonifacio Global City, Taguig.

description: Grand Hyatt Manila has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness center and bar in Manila. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, bathrobes and slippers. Grand Hyatt Manila has some rooms with city views, and each room includes a coffee machine. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Grand Hyatt Manila. At the hotel guests are welcome to use a sauna. Bonifacio High Street is a 10-minute walk from Grand Hyatt Manila, while Power Plant Mall is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino International Airport, 10.9 km from the accommodation.

location: Muralla Corner Victoria Streets, Intramuros, 1001 Manila, Philippines
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Bayleaf Intramuros! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Located within the historic walled city of Intramuros, The Bayleaf is a 5-minute walk from SM Manila and 1 mi from Fort Santiago. It features a rooftop restaurant and bar, free parking, and free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring different color motifs, the air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV, a safety deposit box, and a working desk. Each room has an private bathroom offering shower facilities, bathrobes, and free toiletries. Guests may enjoy local favorites at 9 Spoons while Raffaele Woodfired Pizza offers views of the historic Intramuros wall. The Skydeck features panoramic views of the city's skyline and the Cioccolata Churros Cafe serves danish pastries, croissants, and freshly baked muffins. The hotel provides car rentals, currency exchange, and luggage storage. Laundry, dry cleaning, and ironing services are also available for guests. Robinsons Place Manila is a 10-minute drive from the property while the nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 8.6 mi away from The Bayleaf Intramuros.

To save at this property, all you have to do is  Located in Manila within Makati City, 2.2 mi from Greenbelt Mall and 2.9 mi from SM Makati, Herald Suites Solana features an outdoor rooftop pool, a restaurant, and a 24-hour front desk. description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Privato Ortigas - Multiple Use Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Set in the City of Manila, 1 mi from Shangri-La Plaza and 1.2 mi from SM Megamall, Privato Hotel features a roof deck swimming pool, an on site restaurant and bar, and WiFi access throughout the property. hotel_name_: Century Park Hotel - Multiple Use Hotel and Staycation Approved
location: 599 P. Ocampo St. Malate, 1004 Manila, Philippines
description: The 4-star Century Park Hotel - Multiple Use Hotel and Staycation Approved is located in Manila, a 5-minute drive from The Cultural Center of the Philippines and the Philippine International Convention Center. It features an outdoor pool, spa treatments and 8 dining options are available while WiFi is free throughout the property. Modern and air-conditioned, all rooms come with cable TV channels, a personal safe and a tea/coffee maker. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and some rooms have a flat-screen TV. Guests have an in-room massage and hot tub soaks. Day trips and car rentals can be arranged at the tour desk. The hotel also provides a business center and meeting rooms. Enjoy Japanese cuisine at Century Tsukiji or international delights at Cafe in the Park. Other dining options include snacks by the pool-side Palm Grove, sandwiches at Deli Snack and cocktails drinks/afternoon tea at the Atrium Lounge. Robinsons Place Manila is a 10-minute drive away while the nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 5.7 mi from Century Park Hotel - Multiple Use Hotel and Staycation Approved.

To save at this property, all you have to do is  A 10-minute walk from shops at the Greenbelt, Spaces Hotel Makati - People & Pets offers affordable nonsmoking rooms with free WiFi. location: 114 Legaspi Street, Legaspi Village, Makati, 1229 Manila, Philippines
description: Located in the heart of Makati Central Business District, The Charter House operates a 24-hour front desk and offers modern rooms with vinyl floor.  It features an outdoor swimming pool and provides free Wi-Fi access in the entire property. The property is conveniently a 3-minute walk to the famous Greenbelt Malls and within an 8-minute walk to the Glorietta Malls. The Ayala Museum is just a 15-minute walk away, while Ninoy Aquino International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Airport transfers are available at a surcharge. Equipped with a fridge and mini-bar, air-conditioned rooms come with a wardrobe, desk, a cable TV and seating area. Rooms include an private bathroom offering shower facility. The friendly staff at The Charter House can assist guests with fax/photocopying, laundry and massage services. For guests’ convenience, an ATM/cash machine is available on site and meeting/banqueting facilities can be arranged on request. The in-house Capiz Coffee Shop serves a tasty menu of local and international dishes. Meals can also be served in private with room service.
